mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GOODS g, GUIDE gu WHERE G_FLAG=1 AND g.GU_SEQ= gu.GU_SEQ ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS g, GUIDE gu WHERE G_FLAG=1 AND g.GU_SEQ= gu.GU_SEQ ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC
SELECT g.G_AREA, g.G_NAME, g.G_IMG1, g.G_PRICE, g.G_PEOPLE, g.G_RES, g.G_ONELINE FROM GOODS g, REVIEW r WHERE g.G_SEQ=r.G_SEQ AND g.G_FLAG=1 ORDER BY (SELECT COUNT(R_SEQ) FROM REVIEW) DESC
SELECT G_AREA, G_NAME, G_IMG1, G_PRICE, G_PEOPLE, G_RES, G_ONELINE FROM GOODS WHERE G_AREA=#{g_area} AND G_FLAG=1 ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC

SELECT g.G_SEQ, g.G_AREA, g.G_NAME, g.G_THUMBIMG,g.G_REGDATE, g.G_PRICE, g.G_PEOPLE, g.G_RES, g.G_ONELINE,g.G_FLAG, gu.GU_SEQ, gu.GU_NAME,gu.GU_PHONE,gu.GU_EMAIL,gu.GU_IMG,gu.GU_INTRO,gu.GU_BANK,gu.GU_ACC FROM GOODS g, GUIDE gu WHERE g.GU_SEQ=gu.GU_SEQ ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC

SELECT g.G_SEQ,g.GU_SEQ,g.G_AREA,g.G_LAN, g.G_NAME,g.G_CONTS,g.G_FLAG,g.G_IMG1, g.G_PRICE,g.G_PEOPLE,g.G_RES,g.G_ONELINE, g.G_ADDRESS,g.G_TIME,g.G_DATE,g.G_REGDATE, g.G_THUMBIMG,g.G_MTIME,g.G_LAT,g.G_LNG, g.G_CATEGORY,g.G_INFO,gu.GU_NAME,gu.GU_EMAIL, gu.GU_IMG,gu.GU_INTRO FROM GOODS g, GUIDE gu WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq} AND g.GU_SEQ=gu.GU_SEQ
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS (G_SEQ, GU_SEQ, G_AREA, G_LAN, G_NAME, G_CONTS, G_FLAG, G_IMG1, G_PRICE, G_PEOPLE, G_RES, G_ONELINE, G_ADDRESS,G_CATEGORY,G_TIME, G_MTIME, G_LAT, G_LNG, G_INFO,G_DATE,G_REGDATE,G_THUMBIMG) VALUES (GOODS_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{gu_seq}, #{g_area}, '한국어',#{g_name},#{g_conts}, 0,#{g_img1},#{g_price}, #{g_people},0,#{g_oneline}, #{g_address},#{g_category},#{g_time}, #{g_mtime}, #{g_lat}, #{g_lng}, #{g_info},#{g_date},SYSDATE,#{g_thumbimg})
mapper.update: UPDATE GOODS SET G_FLAG=1 WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
UPDATE GOODS SET G_FLAG=0 WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
UPDATE GOODS SET G_RES=G_RES+1 WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
UPDATE GOODS SET G_NAME=#{g_name}, G_CONTS=#{g_conts}, G_DATE=#{g_date}, G_MEET=#{g_meet}, G_IMG1=#{g_img1}, G_ADDRESS=#{g_address}, G_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE G_SEQ=#{g_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (R_SEQ, M_SEQ, G_SEQ, R_CONTS, R_REGDATE, R_IMG, R_STAR, R_ANS, R_GUFLAG) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL ,#{m_seq}, #{g_seq}, #{r_conts},SYSDATE,#{r_img}, #{r_star},NULL,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET R_CONTS=#{r_conts}, R_IMG=#{r_img}, R_STAR=#{r_star}, R_ANS=#{r_ans}, G_ADDRESS=#{g_address}, R_REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE R_SEQ=#{r_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS g, GUIDE gu WHERE G_FLAG=1 AND g.G_CATEGORY=#{cate} AND g.GU_SEQ= gu.GU_SEQ ORDER BY G_REGDATE DESC
